text: "Kids" is a song by Canadian rock band PUP, released on January 15, 2019 as the lead single from the group's third studio album, Morbid Stuff (2019). The band performed the song on Late Night with Seth Meyers in March 2019. They also did a Christmas Kids version of the song for CBC kids that premiered on December 10th, 2019. ==Music video== The song's music video was released on January 30, 2019, and was directed by Jeremy Schaulin-Rioux. The clip takes place in the year 2059, and was described by Althea Legaspi of Rolling Stone as "bleak". "Our goal was to sorta set viewers up for this happy feel-good ending, and then at the last minute, crush them with darkness," Babcock explained. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2019 singles Category:Rise Records singles Category:Canadian punk rock songs
title: Kids (PUP song)
